data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Even the wikipedia article on Aristarchus' On The Sizes and Distances correctly shows a right triangle. While ____ measurement ____ distance ____ relevant ____ parallax, they ____ not ____. If ____ does ____ explain ____ me ____ I ____ mistaken ____ the ____ I ____ delete ____ paragraph. At least, I think an additional comment should be added signaling Aristarchus did not measure parallax.
data.partBlankContent: Even the wikipedia article on Aristarchus' On The Sizes and Distances correctly shows a right triangle. While t__ measurement o_ distance i_ relevant t_ parallax, they a__ not equiv_____. If som____ does n__ explain t_ me w__ I a_ mistaken wit___ the we__ I wi__ delete t__ paragraph. At least, I think an additional comment should be added signaling Aristarchus did not measure parallax.
data.answer: 甚至维基百科上关于阿里斯塔克斯的《关于大小和距离》的文章也正确地显示了直角三角形。虽然距离的测量与视差有关，但它们并不相等。如果在一周内没有人向我解释为什么我错了，我会删除这段话。至少，我认为应该添加一个额外的评论，表明阿里斯塔克斯没有测量视差。
